name: bridgeapi
description: A dead simple Express-like Lambda hello world example

scripts.build: npm install --production && rm -rf build && mkdir build && zip -r -q -x='*media*' -x='*terraform*' -x=*coverage* -x='*.md' -x='LICENSE' -x='*build*' -x='*.DS_Store*' -x='*.git*' build/bridgeapi.zip . && du -sh build

author: cujarrett
